review_text: We could walk to great restaurants. The small town was beautiful. Couldn’t ask for a better place to stay.
Great location and friendly hosts! Parking can be a pain because daytime parking on the street is limited to 2 hours and the nearest public lot is a 2 minute walk away.
Central location, comfortable and clean. Enjoyed my stay!
Great location for anything downtown.
Second time staying here & will definitely be back. Love the location downtown.
A wonderful place to stay!
Tracy was an awesome host. She answered our many questions and was accommodating to our needs

My husband and I stay at a boondocks BlackHills cabin, with solar lights and little else, so we really appreciate Tracey's sweet apartment with hot water and super fast wifi, for a quick clean up and connect. The kitchen has everything you need (cooking in is mainly our style, although there are several restaurants within walking distance). We stay every year, and everything slways goes super smooth (even the stairs, lol). Easy to park, check in, very clean, and communication with Tracy is always excellent. Thanks again for another wonderful downtown historic Spearfish experience. Aloha, Rebecca&Dave
Thank you
Well maintained & furnished. Nice big windows facing Main Street. Easy to find.

This place was one of my favorite AirBnBs we have ever stayed in. Comfortably appointed and extremely conveniently located. I loved the vaulted ceilings with pressed tin tiles, and the big soft bath towels and cloths. We had a blast teaching our five year old how to play Monopoly with the local edition, and the brewery two blocks away does a great beer flight. I highly recommend this lovely downtown loft.

Awesome stay at the Spearfish Loft! Thoroughly enjoy the historic building with modern upgrades. Great location and views right off Main Street. Plenty to do right outside the door while peaceful and comfortable inside. Would definitely stay again!
Tracy and Nathan were great hosts being quickly responsive and considerate of a need that came up during my stay.
Easy. Great location and Tracy was easy to communicate with.
Very convenient. Cozy. Host is quick to respond and accommodating. It was a fun place to stay!

This loft was a cute downtown night on our long trip.
They do not want pets because of the lofts gorgeous original hard wood floors.
Place is spotless and cozy.
The bed is old and losing comfort.
Parking situation is my only true complaint and the property cannot do anything about that. You can’t street park overnight so then your stuck in a parking lot you can’t see by a sketchy motel… did see quite a bit of sketch people at night. And a crotch rocket woke us up from a dead sleep in the middle of the night. Scared my whole family to death. If you want a quiet oasis.. this isn’t it. If you want a weekend down town and plan on going out and staying up this is for you.
The owners are amazing and responsive. The loft is cute and clean!!! Just know what your getting into.
Great stay in fun downtown Spearfish! Tracy was great to work with-I highly recommend!!!

Cute little place. Sleeping space is definitely geared more for a couple than family. My adult child said the pull out couch was uncomfortable. The king size bed was way to firm for my liking. Was super excited to see a fridge with ice maker! We drink tons of ice water.

The Downtown Loft East was a great location for us to stay at! It was close to our relatives house, restaurants, bars and shops! It was even right on the parade route for the 4th of July as well as the Downtown Friday Nights Event.
Although it did come with a set of knives, a knife sharpener would be a handy thing to have.
If there was something we needed for the loft, we called the number listed and help was minutes away.
Thanks for a wonderful Spearfish experience!
You will not find a better location in downtown Spearfish! Would absolutely recommend Tracy’s place.
A great place to stay right in the heart of Spearfish. We loved that we could walk to restaurants, ride bikes on the city trails and visit the coffee shops nearby.

Beautiful place, historic with all the wonderful amenities you need for a great stay right on the Main Street! Coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping all within steps. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Nice place, great location.
Best apartment in all ways. We enjoyed iur stay in this beautiful historic space!!
Loved this spot!! Will definitely stay again.

We absolutely loved our stay. This loft was absolutely perfect for our little family. We arrived just in time for the Lights Parade, then walked to a restaurant for dinner and to a coffee shop the next morning. This is the perfect location to walk anywhere downtown! The loft it’s self was exactly how pictured and described and even better in person: even the couch, blanket and towels were soft and cozy! We will definitely be back. Thanks again for letting us stay in your historic building!!
My whole experience was great. The only issue I had was I couldn't stay longer.
Cutest apartment in the heart of downtown Spearfish. Can’t beat the location at all! Loved the gorgeous windows and tall ceilings. Highly recommend to anyone!
Loved this Airbnb & definitely plan to return. Such a stylish & modern little place. It’s the perfect getaway!
Cute place, perfect location. Would stay again.
Amazing Stay. Loved the wooden floors
Spacious, cute, and very clean! Loved that it was within walking distance to shops and restaurants.
Cozy, charming and comfortable. Great location if you want to experience downtown Spearfish.
Not only was this the perfect location for all of the attractions and shopping in Spearfish, but the cleanliness and small amenities in this loft were perfect!

Absolutely loved this place! I've stayed many places in Spearfish and this was my favorite especially the history of it. It can get loud on main at night and I like a window open so if you're a light sleeper its maybe not for you. The location is perfect!

Tracy’s place was really neat! I don’t think you could be more centrally located and it seemed really unique! It had everything we needed, was nicely decorated, very clean and Tracy was very responsive and helpful. I would happily recommend this to anyone looking to stay in the area. I can’t wait to bring my husband back to this place!
This apartment was really cool and it there just happened to be a parade on Saturday morning that we got front row seats to right from the comfort of the living room!! =)

My husband and I enjoyed our stay right in the middle of downtown Spearfish. We walked to parks and restaurants and enjoyed the unit. Bed was comfy, shower water pressure was great and towels were super thick and fluffy. It was also quiet at night. Great stay!

Our second stay at Stacey's apartment, and as the last time very clean and neat with everything needed for cooking, lounging and watching football! We stay at a remote cabin when we visit the BlackHills and then take a couple days in historic Spearfish which has a very chic clean downtown. Love staying at Stacey's and plan to be back soon! Thank you & Aloha,
Rebecca & Dave
Volcano HI
Nowhere's WY
We loved our AirBnB in Spearfish! it was a great size, quick walk to restaurants and breweries and (bonus points) a really cool, historical building. Wish we had more than 1 night.

The loft is right in the heart of downtown Spearfish so it was great to be able to walk to many places and not as touristy as other nearby towns. There is street noise but not late at night so it was worth it to be near restaurants, etc. The loft is spacious and was perfect for my husband and I. Would definitely stay here again!
Very clean and modern with historical touches everywhere. Great communication with the host(s). Expect traffic sounds. We used a small fan for white noise to sleep.

Tracy was a great host! We asked for restaurant suggestions and had a quick reply! The place was nice and clean! It was a great location within walking distance of bars, food, boutiques and coffee! We would definitely return given the chance.
The apartment was very clean & tidy. A very nice place to stay.

This place was a great stay. Our group of three people were here just one night and booked the night before our stay and Tracy was a super quick responder to our booking request. The location us right on Main street and walking distance to many places downtown. The loft was simple but modern and well thought out. We'd stay again!
Easy peasy. Exactly as advertised.
Tracy’s place was super cute and very convenient for our trip! We are grateful that everything was as advertised and would certainly book again if we are ever in the area.
Great location!
Such an adorable place to stay. Walking distance to shopping and restraunts. Will definitely come back again
This is an amazing location! Super easy check in/out, and the place is clean and really awesome! Definitely the place to stay in Spearfish
Very cute loft in the PERFECT location!! Downtown right in the middle of coffee shops, shopping and restaurants made for the perfect week! Highly recommend!
Cute little place right downtown Spearfish! Within walking distance to several eateries, coffee shops, bars and Spearfish park. Will definitely return next time we are in the area!

This loft is super clean. No parking on-site, unless you are on the street. We parked about a block away. There is a good amount of steps to get up too the loft, but that was no issue for us. We loved the Friday night downtown band and food trucks. We we would definitely come back. Tracy was super quick to reply. Wonderful experience.

Tracy and Nathan are the best hosts! Their communication was fast and they were ready to assist when we got a flat tire on the way to Spearfish! The apartment is the perfect location downtown and they decorated it beautifully. They even have vibrating/massage recliner chairs that were amazing after a day of walking.

Such a cute place! Great location for everything downtown Spearfish 😊 there’s many options for parking, even with us hauling dirt bikes. Tracy communicated quickly with us when we needed assistance and was a wonderful host. We will for sure be back again!
Fun little place right in the heart of Spearfish! Easy to find, comfortable and the surrounding area has plenty to offer!
This was a beautiful place in a perfect spot. Very clean and beautiful!

Great place - we loved the floors and history! Location was perfect. Great boutiques and restaurants within minutes. Agree it’s on the louder side (especially with the summer Friday festival), so just note if you have littles - we travel with a sound machine so not a huge deal.

Clean, lovingly cared for historic apartment overlooking downtown Main Street, Spearfish. Modern upgrades with 1900's main wood flooring present. Comfortable open concept kitchen/living area, with separate bed and bathroom (shower head is tall with great pressure). Perfect couple size. Easy to enter off the street with 24 steps to your abode (get that workout in each day!). Shops and restaurants are within walking distance, but we appreciated the full kitchen and cookware for dining in. Thank you Tracy for your hospitality!
Very clean

Tracy's place is very cute! We loved the feel of the historic building and the touches such as the original wood floors. The apartment was well stocked with anything we could've needed. You can hear the street noises which we knew before arriving, but it didn't affect our stay. We would definitely stay again.

Location, location, location! Pros: close to everything, you can walk everywhere, so many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops nearby. Cons: you can hear everything, music from the bars, people talking on the street below, loud vehicles, parking is about a block away in a public lot.
The place is very cute, well maintained, clean, and comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with olive oil, salt and pepper. Tracy is a great host with good communication and quickly resolved an issue with the lock system.
Cute, cozy and convenient.
Great stay! Comfortable, close to restaurants and shops. Would stay again!
Great location in downtown Spearfish with everything you could need!
Very Clean. Right down town. Beautifully decorated.

A fun slice of South Dakota hospitality. The old downtown buildings were interesting and a great history lesson. The loft is very clean with nice touches. The bed was extremely comfortable and the linens and towels were thick and soft. It’s a great place to stay! Thank you!

We recently visited Spearfish and the Black Hills and thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The loft was beautifully historic and cozy (the extra blanket to snuggle with on the couch was a nice touch). We couldn't have asked for a better location - right downtown in historic Spearfish with easy access to many restaurants, breweries, coffee houses, and local shops!

Awesome location, price, communication and owners are very accommodating. We have stayed here multiple times and live it. One small downside is because it’s right downtown and on Main Street the road noise can be a little loud.

Tracy is great! The downtown loft suite was perfect for my stay in Spearfish. I liked the 1900's building location, comfort of the suite, and friendliness of the host. I would stay there again. Thank you!!
Such a cute place to stay and it's so convenient with being on Main St in downtown! My girls & I stayed here the night before my wedding and it was so cute and cozy! Has a great view of Main St!
Loved the apartment! Very easy to access and right down town within walking distance to almost anything! Great history too!

What a cute, cozy loft apt. in a great location in beautiful, downtown, Spearfish, SD. We recommend your place to everyone. The price was right, the location was perfect, it’s surrounded by coffee shops, great shopping, wonderful restaurants and only a few miles from Black Hills State University. The accommodations were comfortable and the hosts responsive. What a perfect place to stay the weekend or for an extended stay like ours. I hope all your other guests will enjoy it as much as we have.
Jhett and Kathy
It's an awesome place to stay! quick responses too
Awesome location close to many downtown amenities. Excellent loft and a wonderful stay!
Excellent location, very nice place. Would stay here again.
Great place to stay. Very clean and good location.

Very accommodating and clean loft apartment. Great location allows for easy access to shops, dining, and bars. Well stocked with essentials and supplies for short or long stay. Easy check-in and check-out. Would highly recommend for anyone visiting the Black Hills/Spearfish area.

Beautiful loft! Very well stocked with dishes and basic supplies as well!
Perfectly clean, comfortable, and a lovely view!
You won’t be disappointed with the loft
Great stay and recommend it to everyone
Highly recommend staying here!

I beautifully set up apartment overlooking main st with plenty of restaurants and a natural foods grocery within walking distance. The apartment has everything you could need for a short or long stay. Tracy is quick to respond and check-in was a breeze.

If you plan to stay on a weekend night then be prepared for lots of yelling and screaming between 1:30am-2:30am. Not owners fault but there are lots of drunk college students leaving and walking from the bars. Location otherwise is excellent. If you have any back problems or just need a nice mattress for good rest then this spot might be an issue for you. Other than those things the place is beautiful and very well stocked!

Small charming historic place with high ceilings and a super convenient location. Floor boards are a little creaky but this place is clean and comfy and perfect for one or two people to get away. Leave your car behind and stay downtown for a few days, everything you need is walking distance.
This airbnb was exactly as the pictures indicated! It is spacious, adorable, and comfy!
This is hands down our most favorite place to stay. The hosts are great and extremely helpful. You will not regret staying at either the East or the West Loft.
Great stay! At the heart of downtown! Walking distance to so many great things!
Perfect location and all you need for a weekend getaway
We’ll appointed unit in a fantastic location. The view outside the huge windows were wonderful. Tracy was responsive and offered great sight seeing suggestions. We will be back!
Great communication! Well equipped kitchen. Close to restaurants, night life and groceries. Great natural light!
Beautiful place…clean and great location. The kitchen and bath is well equipped. Great for a long stay. Tracy was so quick to respond to any questions.

Historic charm, super clean and absolutely the best location! The Host was a joy to work with.
If you are a light sleeper like me I would recommend a white-noise app on your phone as there is some light noise from the street below.
You won’t regret booking this lovely loft.
Great location, and very clean
Huge place and kitchen! Everything was clean and comfortable. The locks and all controls were really nice and easy to use. There were also massage chairs.! Great spot! Ty!
This is a stunning space and location. Beautifully furnished and super comfortable, we had a terrific time being in the center of Spearfish in the loft. Highly recommend it!

If you are going to spend some time in Spearfish or in the larger Black Hills area, Tracy's place is just perfect. Everything you need (restaurants, coffee, grocery, drinks) is literally a block or two away. The building is a restored historic landmark building and it perfectly balances old charm with new conveniences. It's very secure and very quiet for sleeping.
Only comment to make is that you do need to climb a floor of stairs to get to the apartment in case this is an issue for you. It was not for us but maybe would be for some older visitors.
Amazing little gem, very clean and easy access. One of the best air bnb experiences I’ve had….also great restaurants in the area!
Great location, had everything we needed.

Conveniently located downtown for coffee , food and shopping! Modern amenities that made our stay easier! Loved the wooden floors and the massage chairs! Definitely a great choice when exploring the town of Spearfish and taking in the scene! We would recommend this downtown loft location to any of our friends and family!

Overall great location and modern updated furnishings downtown near shops and restaurants. Good communication with host.
Downsides: Very steep stairs to second floor, no laundry and no bath sundries so bring your own.
You will not find it more accommodating host or convenient place in Spearfish. We loved it! Very clean.. Very hip.. Would definitely recommend

This is a beautifully renovated upper flat.
Everything is as pictured and described. If you do not like stairs, this is not for you. To me it was worth it….the Historical building was just amazing. And the view to the Street was so great!
Thank you Tracy we hope visit again soon.
Tracy’s loft was the perfect place for my family to stay. It was a unique location in a fun area and we couldn’t have loved it more. Highly recommend!

LOVE It!!! The place exceeded my expectations; specious, well decor, kitchen was fully equiped for cooking my own meals if i wished (and I did). Tracy was a great host, available to answer any questions and promtly! I also had fun during Downtown Friday Night festival on Main Street. The place is located walking distance from a grocery store and a number of eateries. Fun times!

Superb host and property. Communication from start to finish was excellent and the check-in/check-out process was efficient and simple. The property was immaculate and the overall experience was fantastic. A+ host!

Tracy's place is a lovely and I believe the best available spot in Spearfish. I appreciated the very easy self check-in. While there is no designated space, parking for us was quite easy -- we arrived on a Friday afternoon, a spot was available in front of the apartment and due to our time of arrival, we didn't need to move the car after the two hour time limit. The bed was very comfortable and the shades do a great job of blocking out the light. You are in downtown Spearfish (adorable!), overlooking the main street and there is traffic noise. However, the thoughtfully provided fan provides the white noise needed to make sleeping easy. I appreciate the high quality linens for the extra mattress or couch -- my daughter was very comfortable. The photos represent the apartment very accurately. Rugs would go a long way in making the space cozier and there are only two (mismatched) wine glasses.
Great location!!

I would highly recommend this apartment. It is very spacious, clean and near to a lot of attractions. There was a little noise from the street traffic, but Tracy had a fan available in apartment that helped block out noise. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again.
Loft was clean, super cute and in a great location!

Just a really nice and spacious apartment. Clean, well appointed, and fantastic location. Tracy and her husband were great and very responsive to our questions. Super recommendations for food and local things to do. We’ll be back for sure!
Great place and a great location.
Adorable loft. Great location! Very clean.
Exceptional clean, comfortable loft. The parking was a bit inconvenient but manageable. Tracy was extremely responsive and accommodating. Highly recommend.

The studio was big, clean, had lot's of useful stuff and located near everything we could want. We loved Spearfish. It's a great little town with great restaurants, shops and friendly people. Tracy was super responsive and very friendly. Thank you!
Great place to stay!
Great location, secure, and clean! It was perfect for my stay!

This place is so cute and cozy! Right off main street and so easy to navigate getting to and getting into the place with the directions. Tracy was so helpful and kind. I would definitely recommend. The only advise I have is that it is on the second floor of the building so you do have to take stairs up to the apartment, so if you or anyone you are staying with has a disability, getting up the stairs might be challenging. But the stairs weren’t an issue. So clean and perfect! Highly recommend!!!!
Amazing place!!! Location is perfect.
Simple, clean, and easy to check in and out of! Everything an Airbnb should be!
Great Main Street location in the upstairs of a historic building! Perfect for our needs

My family stayed at Tracy's charming loft for one night during our cross-country drive, and it was awesome! The loft is beautiful, stylish, and well considered, and the downtown Spearfish location is great— less than a block away from a wonderful natural food store (Good Earth), a yummy Italian restaurant (Nonna's Kitchen), and a fantastic breakfast/coffee/tea spot (Blackbird Espresso). Our daughter slept on the pull-out sofa, and I was happy to discover it had a much nicer mattress than the average sleeper. We also loved having a bathtub and a comfy king bed. All in all, it was a very enjoyable stay, and I cannot imagine a better spot in Spearfish (though I am sure her other loft is just as lovely). Thanks, Tracy! :)
Beautiful Loft! It was the perfect place to rest after seeing the sights. So clean, perfect location, and kitchen supplies available. Tracy and Nathan were so awesome and very responsive.

Perfectly renovated historic loft in downtown.
Thoughtful touches throughout. Well equipped kitchen.Spotless.

Great location and host. Was a great way to experience downtown Spearfish. Within walking distance to the Lookout Mtn trailhead and a bunch of downtown restaurants and coffee shops. Would definitely recommend.

Beautiful, historic apartment in downtown Spearfish. Super clean! Comfortable bed. It had everything we needed. Apartment was in a convenient location and felt very safe. We would definitely stay here again!
Great place to stay close to restaurants, bar, coffee shops, and gyms. Very clean it felt like home.
The apartment was great. It was clean and comfortable! The location is great!
Really enjoyed my stay. Right in town in walking distance to many things. Nice park a couple blocks away too. Tracy communicated promptly when I had a question. Would stay here again.
Great place and location !

This downtown apartment is cute as it can get. Old hardwood floors, great windows overlooking Main Street, full functional kitchen and cozy bedroom. We loved the space and the location. If you stay here, make sure to check out The Atomic Pizza Cafe right across the street (unbelievable pizza) and the cozy coffee shop -Common Grounds- one block up. We will stay here again. Will be our “go to” place to stay while in Spearfish.

Better than expected! We wish we would've have booked the loft for our entire stay in the Black Hills and made it our basecamp. If you stay in, the loft is super comfy and a great space to hang out in. If you venture out, you have lots of fun options in within a two block radiance, including restaurants, shops, ice cream, grocery and a brewery.

What a perfect getaway located in the heart of my most favorite city in the Black Hills ♥️ Tracy’s home oozes charm- the perfect balance of historic and modern aesthetics. Very clean, comfortable bed, perfect location within walking distance to everything in the city’s center. Highly recommend staying here if you are visiting Spearfish!
Great location and wonderful space
this place was wonderful ! Super happy with our stay here. (:
great loft

ATTENTION: Only stay at this place if you want to be absolutely blown away by an incredibly charming and characteristic apartment overlooking the quaint Main Street Spearfish has to offer. In terms of location, this place is exactly where you want to be: walking distance to cafes, bars, parks, etc. This was a very secured apartment, exceptionally up-to-date & modern while at the same time, rustic with some unique character. The tall ceilings and huge windows gave this 2nd story apartment a great open, airy feeling (don't worry, the beautiful windows had black-out shades if you are wanting some seclusion). Everything was remarkably clean and it felt very comfortable. I honestly don't believe I could ever speak highly enough for this place. If you EVER have the chance to book this place in the Black Hills, DO IT! Thanks again Tracy!
The east loft was comfortable and had everything needed for a great visit to Spearfish. The location was ideal for taking advantage of the downtown amenities.
beautiful loft right on main st! clean and comfortable, walking distance to everything. loved it
Fast internet and comfortable bed.
The apartment was perfect for our stay. So many fun places to go to in the downtown area!
Great location, adorable loft, and all the comforts of home. 10/10 would recommend!
Great downtown location.
100% recommended
Great location to take in downtown Spearfish. Parking is a little challenging and we experienced a couple nights of loud people on the street after bars closed.

This was the perfect little spot. Quiet and perfectly spacious for two. The restaurants and different spots within walking distance are amazing! Highly recommend getting a reservation at Nonna’s kitchen just across the street. If this spot is available for your trip, BOOK IT
Tracy’s place is very clean, and very cool. We loved the style and location of the apartment, and the hosts were very hospitable!
Very quaint!! Great for a weekend getaway!
Great place, near everything!!
A perfect getaway spot. We'd come back in a heartbeat.
Great spot and central.
My wife and I loved our stay. The loft was perfect and the downtown location was great. I highly recommend!

The loft was sparkling clean and a joy to stay at. The morning light through the windows is stunning. The space is extremely warm and a great retreat following outdoor activities. Loved the accessibility to downtown restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Would absolutely return for another stay.

Great place to stay in downtown Spearfish. Really nice loft apartment with all the modern touches in a beautiful historic building. Perfect for a couple for a day or two or a week. Many restaurants and pubs within a few blocks and very short drive to others. Highly recommended if you are staying in Spearfish for any length of time!!

Very clean, was the perfect place for a mini honeymoon!
Love the flooring and and then lighting!
Great downtown unit for 2 people. Close, walking distance to restaurants and shopping.

This loft was truly such a beautiful space! It was in a perfect location right in the heart of downtown and literally a block away from our favorite coffee shop Blackbird! We booked super last minute and Tracy had everything ready to go within minutes of us booking and only a few hours before our arrival! There was a minor problem with the heat and Tracy was so quick to come and fix it and made sure we had other heat sources at our disposable. We spend quite a bit of time in the Black Hills each year and can honestly say that this is one of the nicest Airbnb options for the area and we would 100% stay again!

Amazing and beautiful AIR BNB! Tracy & Nathan the owners helped me surprise my girlfriend with an incredible engagement proposal! I couldn’t have hoped for a better experience with such a spectacular view of downtown Spearfish!

The East loft checked all the boxes if you're looking for a great experience downtown in the heart of Spearfish. It was super clean , modern touches while keeping it historic and cozy! We loved it so much we extended our stay for an extra month. We loved being able to shop at the cutest boutique right below us called 2BG so much fun stuff as well as walk to our favorite coffee shop Common Grounds. We will definitely be back especially at such an affordable price point.. definitely worth every dollar!

We absolutely loved staying at the Downtown Loft East. It’s such a perfect location, surrounded by adorable local shops,
amazing restaurants and very close to the beautiful Spearfish City Park. Tracy and Nathan are incredible hosts and they thought of the smallest details to make our stay very comfortable...from the biggest and softest towels to the cutest coffee mugs made by a local artist. If you’re looking for charming spot in Spearfish, this Loft won’t disappoint. We definitely found our new favorite place to stay at!

This is the place to stay when you are looking for history and peaceful comfort. The home is amazing! The ladies who manage and take care of things are superior and so responsive to issues. You can't go wrong here. We keep coming back because it is so good.

We felt at home right when we arrived! WiFi and cell phone service 5 stars and 5 bars, wonderful for remote working. Amazing fully equipped kitchen. Very comfortable furnishings, so nice to relax. So many nice amenities, we enjoyed the coffee mugs and wine glasses. A lovely home.

Very nicely decorated with a great place to relax by the fireplace and end your day. A well appointed kitchen available as well. Our hosts responded promptly to us with any questions we had. The only problem we experienced was that we had no control over the temperature of the room, other than keeping the balcony door open to keep from getting too warm.

This newly wed couple had just moved back to town and needed a peaceful welcoming home like place to recover from their months of struggles. Sonya was wonderful to work with and they loved their place of refuge while they searched for and found an apartment. Thank you Sonya!
My first time out state airbnb and it was the best! I’ll bring my family next time around
It was just like the pictures! Absolutely loved the stay

Sonya was an amazing host: When I left my shirt behind, she was communicative about how I could get it back from her. She kept it safe for me in the meantime! The room itself was beautiful and clean. Thank you Sonya!
Sonya’s Rose Room was the perfect place for me to rest my head for the night. It was very clean, and the mini fridge in my room was a great plus. Thanks Sonya!
We had a lovely, quiet one night stay and felt right at home. Comfy robes were a plus! Our room and the entire house was clean, inviting and had everything we needed.
The place was exactly as advertised. Sonya was very nice and easy to communicate with. I will recommend this BnB to anyone interested in spending a little time in Spearfish.

This is an amazing getaway! As a travel destination or a local night away with a significant other. I was in the rose room, and I could not have been happier. even the period type sink was in the bathroom next to the modern option. The bed was also amazing to sleep in. everything was clear to still be able to use the hot tub!! I would definitely stay again. The owners are wonderful and very friendly. could be rented for groups of 6 or couples.

Sonya was a great communicator and her place is a true gem. The rose room does heat up in the winter since it is a beautiful historic home, but Sonya gave us permission to crack the windows which helped a lot! The hot tub and amenities alone made it worth our trip! Thank you & happy new year!!
Beautiful place, would definitely stay again!
Nice place, as described. à4 walkable blocks to main areas for restaurants, entertainment. Clean room with minature refrigerator, and micro nearby the rooms upstairs.
Charming place in great location!
We stayed briefly on a road trip back and it was a comfortable stay with everything we needed.
Fantastic place! Had everything and more!
Such a beautiful place!
it was an adorable place and a great stay. I know I'll be staying here if I'm ever in the area and the place is available. felt very cozy.

The Rose Room and entire home and outdoor areas were absolutely darling. Everything was clean, and there were so many little special touches. Sonya was very responsive and helpful, and we had a great visit. Would definitely stay again!

Sonya’s place was a wonderful experience. Lots of room to enjoy and beautifully decorated. The area has tons of walking trails and is very close to downtown. Sonya literally thought of everything you might need.

Spent four peaceful nights in the Secret Garden's Rose Room. I came alone to explore the Northern Black Hills, and the Secret Garden in Spearfish was the perfect base. I wanted a quiet and comfortable room with private bath. The Rose Room was perfect as it is upstairs facing away from the back garden, so very quiet. It has a large private bathroom with a sink, toilet, tub and shower. Plenty of towels. Big comfy bed and a big couch. There is even a little gas fireplace! No ceiling fan but there is an A/C unit which kept things nice and cool. The host Sonya was awesome! There is no curfew. Bicycles are available (I chose to walk). After my first night I discovered I was the only guest in the house...it was nice walking around in my (provided) bathrobe! I enjoyed using the extremely well-stocked kitchen to make breakfast and dinner. Each room has designated space in the refrigerator. The hot tub was CLEAN and HOT!! Really enjoyed my stay, recommended!!
This house was incredible everyone loved the book you put together!
Beautiful 3 bedroom apartment. Great location, 1/2 a block from the college.

We love staying here and will be back!

Excellent place to stay! Easily accommodated 5 adults, and it was very clean.

Our time here was limited so having a clean, comfortable environment was appreciated. The modern decor and placement of rooms made for a comfortable stay. Property was very clean and beautiful. Great experience. Will stay again.

The place was Awesome. the location from the BHSU game was great and we just walked to the game. The place inside was beautiful and I would recommend to anyone. I've stayed and many Airbnb's and the place ranks right at the top.

Such a beautiful, clean space! Perfect location near BH campus. Access to a garage is a plus. Landlords are super responsive and kind. Will definitely be staying again in the future!
It was exactly as listed and clean, comfortable along with perfect location. Would 100% book again!

This is a beautiful rental! It was very modern, spacious and comfortable. A lovely surprise was the thoughtful and creative rental guide book they provided. Loved this place! Everything was great!
Great place!!!
Great place. Highly recommended.

John Michael is truly the type of host you wish you can find every time on AirBNB. This is a new and very clean property. It is very homey and comfortable and spacious, especially the bedrooms. However, be prepared to haul your things up about 20 stairs to get to the main floor. We would definitely book this property again.

We had a very pleasant stay. The condo is very clean, comfortable, well stocked, and nicely decorated. It's well located to anything you might want to do in town. This place is so beautiful and so tastefully decorated. They thought of everything!

This Airbnb is fantastic. The location is relaxing and convenient. The cleanliness is beyond clean, and it is very comfortable. We were so happy with this home away from home for our family. Thank you!
A lovely place, perfect for our group of 4. Clean and bright. The beautiful art photography by a local artist is delightful. A perfect place to stay in Spearfish!
Great place for our family to stay on a Black Hills vacation. Even better than the pictures. Accommodating host.

Best AirBnB we've stayed in! The layout was fantastic, the rooms were all nicely decorated and comfortable. The personalized book with recommendations of things to do was an especially thoughtful touch!

This is a beautiful property. Fantastic location close near all the things you need and about an hour from all the things you want to see in the Black Hills from Devils Tower to Custer State Park. The D. B. Booth fish hatchery is very close by and we strongly recommend visit there. If we are ever going to be in Spearfish again we will be booking here. Thank you so much for a lovely location to call home for a few days.

We enjoyed our stay. Your place is convenient located, clean, and nicely decorated. We missed having chairs to sit out on the patio. You have a great place and you are a friendly and helpful host. I know you will thrive in this business.
This spot is perfect for a Spearfish stay. It was incredibly clean and perfectly cozy - a beautiful and easy-to-find stay. John Michael was very helpful, quick to respond. Thanks so much!
Great place!! We had a great time being snowed in.
This is a great place to stay. The location is convenient. The rooms were spacious and clean. The neighborhood was quiet. You would not regret staying here! We will come back.
This is one of my favorite places to stay when we need a quick get away. Absolutely love the space Cappie has created! ❤️
Great setting, and a perfect spot for an extended weekend
We love to stay at Cappie’s for a little staycation in the hills. It’s quiet and comfortable and never disappoints!
very unique and beautiful, friendly hosts

Granny Flats is not your typical Airbnb - it makes an impression. The house was incredibly unique and cozy. It’s amazing to be in the middle of town, in your own oasis. Love it!!!

This was absolutely a one of a kind stay. Beautiful place, well-kept and clean. Hosts were responsive and welcoming!
We loved the atmosphere too. The sauna is also one of a kind! We would love to return.

Awesome place to stay. Would definitly go back. The sauna is incrediable. The house was super clean. Very nice shower, the wood burner to heat is a nice touch. The place was super easy to find and easy to get to.

This place was so perfect! We took advantage of the location and were able to walk to one of the local trails. Next time we visit Spearfish, we're hoping this rental is available again. Awesome house and awesome host!
Took my girlfriend for a Valentine’s Day retreat and it exceeded my expectations! Will be returning.
Awesome!

Felt relaxing being in the home built with natural materials. The building temperature is surprisingly consistent, and the wood burning stove was easy to use and created a nice atmosphere. The huge cave-like sauna was a nice bonus, in addition to the great home and interesting property.
Great stay highly recommended

Cappie’s pace is a bucolic respite. The hay bale cottage takes you back to a warmer, cozier time-(the efficient woodstove of course adds to that atmosphere). The neighborhood is quiet yet a five minute drive to town. It was a perfect home base for exploring the Black Hills. We will be recommending the cottage to friends and family.
Wonderful place! Thank you!
This cottage was absolutely lovely. Such a nice little retreat within Spearfish. Cappy and his team were great as well, always quick to respond and eager to help.

Amazing cabin, grounds, and hosts! Everything looked just the like pictures on the post and lived up to our expectations. Only issue we had was the hot water not working. After a quick message to the hosts it was resolved a couple hours later. No fuss! Would stay again for sure!

Booked a stay here for a few days after getting married, and liked it so much that we extended the trip! We were here in December, and had an extremely cozy time no matter the weather. The house is beautiful and handbuilt in very thoughtful ways, and is a beautifully warm space. I'd recommend this to anyone wanting to stay in Spearfish!
My favorite place to be. Can’t wait to come back!
Very clean, private, and peaceful! Check-in was very easy. Comfortable stay, we had everything we needed.

I was looking for a unique stay to celebrate my husband’s birthday. This house exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend this house. Easy check-in, easy check-out and private and quiet location.

The natural materials cabin was so beautiful and homey. Perfect for a couples weekend. The furniture was all very comfortable and at 7 months pregnant, I slept amazing! We would definitely recommend this place to others.

The place was as described and was extremely comfortable. The wood burning stove in the evenings worked extremely well. it is a great location to visit and explore the local area. Everything worked well.

We loved our stay at this off grid gem. What a unique location and property. I stayed here for two nights with my two kids. We were so comfortable and had plenty of room to enjoy some off grid time. We explored the walking trails and some of the local attractions. We can’t wait to come back!
The property -
Amazing unique construction with so many fun design ideas. You can tell a lot of efforts went into building this one bed cabin. We enjoyed the rocket ship treehouse, visiting the chickens, and exploring the property. Don’t worry about the toilet - it’s super simple and my 4yr old had no problems.
Location -
What a unique location. You feel like your out of town on a farm but your close enough to walk to restaurant or gas station.
Hosts -
The hosts are top notch, very timely responses to questions and always very helpful
We can’t wait to come back
Thank you!
love our off-grid experience here! everything felt clean and inviting and Cappie was super responsive to any type of questions I had!
Very great host! Very great place to stay! Host went above and beyond!

Was looking for something a little different for a trip without the kids this time. The house was fun to explore and filled with funky design elements. Exploring the grounds and seeing the rocketship treehouse was a giant bonus. Had one question that needed a response while we were there. It was answered almost immediately and the issue was quickly resolved. Really comfortable bed. Would highly recommend if off-grid as a concept is at all of interest to you.
We were pleased with the cleanliness and the surrounding area. A great place to start our adventures.
Amazing place to settle down for the night. Such a unique experience. Must stay.

We had a wonderful stay. The home was exactly as advertised. Cappie and Candace took care of any questions very quickly. What an interesting and unique place! Like other visitors we only wish we could have stayed longer!
Even though we were only here one night, it was the perfect little getaway. Very unique and loved the sustainable features!

Great place to stay while in Spearfish! I’ve stayed here a couple times and I loved it each time. For me it’s worth the money each time.
Amazing how you are in town but feel completely out of town … freaking awesome place..

This off grid cottage was a dream! It was private yet still right in town. There is a walking path to coffee shops, restaurants, farm stands and breweries. The property was gorgeous with a creek, gardens, chickens and artistic touches. I absolutely loved waking up to the sunrise out my bedroom window each morning! I will certainly be back and encourage all my friends who travel to Spearfish to stay at Cappie's!
What a lovely place!
No words to describe how amazing this property is. A true gem. Can’t wait to come back

This homestead was such a peaceful, private, playful, and unique place to stay. We loved the build and warm aesthetic of the interior (the shower, kitchen, and bed were incredible), as well as the expansive 3 acre property. The sauna was so charming and easy to use, we heated it up and took a dip in the river afterwards - it felt incredible! We loved waking up to a horse grazing in the pastor and watching all the colorful chickens, not to mention seeing a couple deer hanging out. This was an awesome Airbnb and we highly recommend booking!
Very comfortable off grid home. We had a very pleasant stay and enjoyed our time there!

The hay bale construction of the cottage makes it a unique place to stay. The finish details of the construction and the decor is great. The cottage is very well insulated and quiet. The off grid aspect was easy to utilize. Cappie was very welcoming and available. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend the cottage.
Very peaceful place. Enjoyed the creek through the property and proximity to the bike path.
Great couples retreat, very peaceful.
Just beautiful. The sauna was amazing.
Incredible space and amazingly quiet even though you are right in town.

one of our highlights during our road trip, beautiful and quiet place, surrounded by nature and very quiet private space. The place is extremely unique but also environmentally friendly, the owner and staff are well considered and responsive, I wish I have more time to stay few more days there.

Honestly, this was the coolest airbnb I’ve ever stayed in and I’ve stayed all over the country. A hidden gem, the compostable toilet was an experience, and the shower felt amazing. The bed is super comfortable and the surrounding property is just absolutely stunning.
Definitely check out the creek & it’s little man made pool, it’s a little chilly but very cool! & the treehouse is jaw dropping as well. Many things on the property to interactive with, don’t forget to say hi to the chickens.
My only regret is that we weren’t able to spend more time here. It’s truly a magical place.

We had some car trouble, but Cappie was very understanding as we got in unfortunately late. The space is amazing! and all the great things to explore on the property are well worth it. A highlight of our trip. My only complaint is we couldn't stay longer!

We loved our stay. We definitely will recommend this place to any of our friends traveling in that direction. It had a nice homey feel with personal touches that was a breath of fresh air compared to the cookie cutter airbnbs that are all too common now. It was one of the cleanest airbnbs we've ever stayed in too! Great central location for the hikes we had planned for the second half of our trip.
Beautiful property and overall nice stay. Only spent one night but definitely would be back!

The host were great. We were confused and misunderstood that the soaking tub is not a man madehot tub, or we wouldn't have traveled as far out of our way to stay because that was one of the main reasons we did. Overall it's a very nice place.
beautiful space that we were able to relax at and unwind. would definitely stay again!
Awesome place and host! Always wanted to stay in a off grid home and this one was perfect. Thank you!

A lovely, quiet place with a beautiful view. We loved the vibe of this place-it felt calm and was a great place to relax and disconnect yet very close to downtown and easy to get to the canyon. I was nervous about the composting toilet, but don't worry-it's fine! Communication and response to the few questions we had was quick. We will come back!
Place was very interesting. The toilet was a bit noisy but liveable.
Such a beautiful and unique place. Would not hesitate to stay there again. So comfortable. Thanks Cappie for opening up your home!
Beautiful place with plenty to do. River pool and sauna combination makes me wish we had longer! Treehouse and grilling in the yard. Very good time!
Such a unique, amazing place stay! Loved our experience and stay! Town also had great food and breweries close to the property.

Cappie's place was a unique and eco-friendly experience tucked away at the end of a private street. The house construction and all the amenities are fully sustainable and he was very helpful in getting me settled in for the weekend. I will definitely choose this location again when visiting Spearfish, SD. A++ experience.
Very cozy and it was the perfect size for 2 people :)

Great experience! Beautiful house and very central to skiing resorts. House is central in a small town but the house is located very privately. The house gives a great 90s decore vibe and we loved it. Sauna was a great experience too. Perfect place for a weekend stay.
I had such an enjoyable stay at the cottage. I would definitely revisit.

Such a great stay! Would recommend to anyone! Spearfish was such a fun area and I would’ve loved to spend more time there! I was just passing through for a night. Much to do and such a unique place to stay.

The place is perfect, it had been on my bucket list for a couple of years and we were finally able to make it happen. Cappie's description is 100 percent correct. If you read it all the way through and are still intrigued about staying, do so, the craftsmanship of the cottage is incredible and so interesting. All of the little details inside and out make you appreciate it even more. Such a neat place to unwind or rewind. We will definitely be back to stay, we loved it all. He is an excellent host and super thorough and very accommodating!
We absolutely loved our stay at Cappie's cabin!!
Cappie was very responsive and helpful We enjoyed the unique cottage and the privacy it offered!
This was the most unique place me and my boyfriend have ever stayed. The home was absolutely beautiful and it being off the grid made it even better.

Absolutely amazing stay. So unique and Cappie was an excellent host. The cottage was cozy when we arrived, fire blazing in the hearth. Secluded and quiet. This is the coolest house ever -- stay here!

Was a great way to learn about being off grid! Had a peaceful time together as a couple. The sauna was amazing and very well worth the wait for the time it takes to get started! The owner cappie was very helpful and we got to chat with him for a bit and learn a lot about the cottage we stayed in! Highly recommend it was a beautiful place to be!

Cappie’s home was one of the coolest places we have ever stayed! Pure genius and simplicity went into the creation of the straw bale construction and off grid setup. Everything was comfortable and convenient while remaining quite stylish. We loved our stay and will highly recommend it to anyone else!
Amazing cottage!

We go out of our way to find AirBNBs that practice sustainability when we can, and this place is certainly that! So many amazing and beautiful features we wish we had more time to enjoy them all. Really appreciated the headed mattress as it was a chilly night!
inspirational surroundings. ease and simplicity of getting in an out. wonderful wood stove and cozy bed nook. take your time, breath and enjoy. highly recommend.
Cappie’s place is extremely welcoming, cozy, and unique. I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay in the area. Perfet for couples or solo adventurers. It was perfect for my husband and me!
A place you won’t stay in again and again! Close to everything you need food and drinks just around the corner! We will be back to stay again when we are in the area!!
Very responsive to messages. Thanks for a great stay!
We couldn't have enjoyed it more! We especially liked roasting s'mores on the outdoor fire pit, and staying cozy at night with the wood stove.
Great place in Spearfish!

Such a cute house and a fun experience staying off the grid

Probably the cleanest Airbnb we've stayed at.

Super cool spot, and Cappie is a great host. Would absolutely stay again!
What a beautiful, unique place! Such a surprise to have this located within city limits! Directions were clear and easy to follow. The grounds were beautiful and offered us a peaceful place to stay.
Thanks so much !
Amazing place, will definitely stay and recommend again

We would highly recommend this place to stay if you are visiting Spearfish. This house is so unique and very comfortable! Make sure and spend some time in the hammock in the creek if you can! We had everything we needed and felt right at home. we were close to beautiful sites and delicious restaurant options. Recommendations are given as well which is very helpful. Thank you so much for letting us enjoy this great place!

One of the best Air Bnbs we’ve stayed at, and we’ve stayed at quite a few. What a great place. Amazing comfort and amenities, especially for off-grid. It’s obvious Cappie has put a lot of thought and artistry into this place.

Great little of the grid home! Very comfortable!
Amazing secret little creekside getaway!

We had a pleasant stay, very clean, cozy and comfortable. It was super hot while we were there and the A/C worked great. Comfy bed and sitting area, we enjoyed the privacy of the yard too. I even saw a deer in yard one afternoon. Our hosts had great communications and provided a safe, comfortable environment.

Nice cabin! Around the bed could use a good deep cleaning. Solar panel energy is ok but when its 90s and you want to run the ac a lot it uses up all the energy. Gets pretty hot in the bedroom at night time.
View was amazing, host was very kind!
Everyone about this stay was wonderful! Highly recommend staying here and taking a dip in the creek on a hot day!!

Pictures do not do this incredible home justice. The moment you pull up, you will be amazed! Choosing an off the grid home that is completely independent and self-sustsinable, we had no idea what to really expect. Well, this home does not disappoint to give you a location to enjoy all of the Black Hills, and every luxury you are used to. The shower is amazing.
