After long days exploring and hiking, we enjoyed taking a dip in the water hole, made bonfires under beautiful stars and even watched a movie.
If you are lucky, you will get to meet the talented and truly amazing, Cappie. Talking to him was one of our highlights. He is so attentive to make sure your stay is comfortable and you have all you need. Plus, he genuinely builds relationships with those around him.
We are amazed with the craftsmanship of the home and every detail put in! It was such a great trip. This place will not disappoint.
This was a nice little stay, that provided a relaxing get away.

This is our second time at Cappie's place driving cross country from seattle to Minneapolis and we highly recommend it! We absolutely love this place!
It's just so cool- such a unique structure that's creative, cozy, comfortable and well laid out. The bed is suuuper comfortable! The home is so well designed, clean and decorated. The place has a fun funky vibe and is perfect for two people to unwind and relax in a beautiful space! Be sure to experience it for yourself!

10 out of 10 RECOMMEND to anyone!!
This was one of the best experiences I’ve had whilst renting Airbnb’s - the host is extremely friendly and a great resource for the best spots in Spearfish and they have truly thought of everything!

Staying at this off-the-grid spot was an absolute treat. The cabin was beautiful and clean, just like the pictures. No complaints about this place! We explored the property. The cabin itself sits in a small field and across the creek there is another AirBnb owned by the same folks. Both places share access to the creek, treehouse and outdoor sitting area. I will definitely stay here again, we were sad to leave!

This has been one of our fave places to stay. Great layout for a couple and very convenient location to Town, Spearfish Cr. and adjacent to the park/trials. You can't beat sustainable living and we wish there were more places like this on Airbnb.
Fantastic hosts (and humans).

Excellent communication, clean, perfect location, solar worked perfect, first time using a compost toilet and actually preferred it over a standard toilet, will be staying again! Loved our experience, wouldn’t change a thing.

This was our first time to stay in an “off-the-grid” Airbnb. The architecture & construction materials of this cottage were so interesting. We found it to be a very comfortable place to come home to after all-day sightseeing & motorcycle rides. We loved it & the beautiful town of Spearfish too! Denise & Ed Davis
Spent our honeymoon here and absolutely loved this place!!! Such a unique stay!

This was a great place to stay! It was clean, well-kept, and on a beautiful piece of property that is fairly secluded (though not as much as some of the pictures may suggest). The hosts were very communicative and offered suggestions of events that were happening. The binder of info they provided about the cottage and the town was useful and informative. Overall it was a very pleasant visit!
There is one thing that was enough of a problem to warrant the 4 stars. If you are at all sensitive to noise, the fan on the compost toilet is loud enough that you hear it everywhere in the cabin (at least when I stayed in June 2022). You can even hear it while watching TV. It made it difficult to fall asleep because it is not pleasant. It was a relief when the fridge would kick on and drown out the noise in a more pleasant sound.
Another note is if you do go in the swimming hole, it is shared or right on the border with another property (which I believe they also rent out). That's fine by me but not well represented.

Located in town, yet very private and quiet. Great communication with the host.
It was fun watching the animals from the windows and exploring the grounds. Very comfortable bed. Place was clean and had everything you would need! Really cool property, would stay again!

If you’re looking for somewhere to stay in this area, look no more! This is hands down the best, most comfy and cozy home to stay in. It’s the perfect retreat from a long day of travel. Just book it! You won’t regret it!

We can’t say enough good things about our stay at this cottage. Amazingly welcoming and had everything we needed, from nice shampoo/conditioner/soap to a sweet fire pit outside. The house binder even had dinner and coffee recommendations. It was a bit too chilly to take a dip in the swimming hole but I’m sure that would’ve been lovely as well. Callie and Emily know how to host a great Airbnb

What a unique and fun experience. As a city girl, I’ve never stayed anywhere with such character and practicality. Everything we needed was supplied and we enjoyed sitting outside each evening watching the deer and rabbits.
This location was absolutely beautiful! The space was amazing and just outside of Spearfish's Main St. A perfect location with beautiful views and lots of wildlife.

We would definitely rent this off grid home again. It was peaceful and minimal which allowed our spirits to rest and rejuvenate. You won’t be disappointed by the beautiful view by staying in this rental. Thanks again!

Perfect place to relax and unwind. Amazing hosts, great location. Everything was perfect. Off the grid isn't for everyone but for those that can appreciate it, the attention to detail is amazing, felt so comfortable that I booked an extra night. Thanks.

My husband and I stayed at Cappie’s for our 10 yr anniversary. The place was clean and cozy. We loved the wood fire place, which kept the place warm even though high winds and snow. The location was really great, just being on the edge of spearfish with great access to restaurants. Would definitely stay here again!

Best Airbnb yet!
Unique custom house that is tastefuly decorated. Quiet yet close to town.
Cappie provided quick helpful communication. Wood burning stove was novel and put out good heat. I wish I could move the house as I would book it every time I travel.
The best AirBnb I’ve stayed at.

One of the joys of travel is getting to stay in places that you would never otherwise have a chance to try living in, and this location is that to a tee. This place is an experience unlike any I have ever had, from the floor up (literally; even the adobe flooring was a new experience for me!). Not only is the location fun and interesting—Spearfish is the perfect combination of "small enough to enjoy" and "large enough to have some conveniences"—but the building itself is a joy to stay in. It's design is rustic and interesting, but it does not sacrifice in comfort anywhere, from the spacious shower (with ample hot water) to the luxurious bed. If you're anywhere in the area, you owe it to yourself to spend a night or two here and just experience a different way of living.
Very cool and unique!
This is our 3rd stay and as always, we loved it. Amazing house and perfect location for our travels!
Fascinating, super cool space! Responsive, informative hosts. It was quite an experience staying there even if only for one night. Check it out!
This is a great place to stay at and a great location!
What a unique little place! Very fun place to stay in the hills, we loved it!
Everything is as stated. Very well done and quite cozy. Toilet will be a surprise even though we were warned but worth the stay!

Cappie did an incredible job with this place! My brother and I had a great time exploring the black hills and loved coming back to have a fire in the wood stove or fire pit at night. This is the spot to stay in Spearfish!
Very nice place, would highly recommend!
Lovely and unique stay! We were so pleased and we had a wonderful Valentine's Day. Thanks so much.
Amazing place all from the art to the sustainability to how fun the whole process is! Would love to come back

This place is gorgeous. The bed is sooo comfortable & the house stayed super warm with the wood burning stove. WiFi worked great for movie nights. Only heads up I would give is the bathroom has no doors & the walls do not go all the way up to the ceiling. So you have to be pretty comfortable with the people you’re traveling with. Other than that, it was a gorgeous place that made for a perfect stay. Would 100% recommend.
This place is so insanely cool!!!! So unique, a great location, the hosts are amazing. 1000/10!!!!

A truly quiet and comfortable home. Everything was supper clean. The bed dreamy comfortable. Clear instructions provided on the different aspects of working with this off grid home made our stay relaxing.
Thank you so much for allowing us to stay at your place. It created such a beautiful memory for my daughter's 16th birthday 🙏

This is hands down the best airbnb I have every stayed at! So many little details are fully thought out that it all adds up tp be an absolutely amazing place to stay! I found myself able to genuinely relax and unwind in this home. Not only that, but the bedding was so comfortable I found it online to buy it for when I'm home as well! Over all, no detail is ignored and I could not recommend this place more highly. The hosts are extremely communicative and kind, it makes staying here so comfortable!

Staying here was such a delight! My boyfriend and I love new experiences and while this place has all the amenities of a regular house it also has so many unique features! It’s conveniently located in town, but when you’re on the property it feels like you are out of town! It’s so quiet and the best of both worlds! Not only is the house amazing, but the wood fired sauna and tree house are such cool bonuses!
I wasn’t able to stay due to a last minute family emergency but the pictures of the space looked amazing and the communication prior was great.

No curtain or door for the bathroom felt a little odd - so as long as you are comfortable with your travel partners, this otherwise was an amazing place! We stayed plenty warm with the wood burning stove even on cold winter nights.
This place is absolutely stunning! The little details in the construction took our breath away. Cappie’s place is cozy, snug, and the perfect stay.
Awesome place! Loved it! Had lots of laughs about the shitter!

This home is worth the trip to South Dakota just to stay in it. Everything is thought of - everything about the house is clever and unique, and they take the time to show you how to use everything. There are a couple of really cool amenities that I don't know if the hosts want announced publicly yet so I'll keep it to myself, but let's just say it's an outdoor/nature paradise, and you'll be pleasantly surprised in a lot of ways

The cabin was perfect for my wife and I’s little weekend get away. It’s secluded, yet still close enough to town and all its amenities. The cabin is one of a kind, once we spent 10 minutes exploring the cabin we felt at home there. It was very cozy, the well thought out. It had everything we needed, the fireplace kept us nice and warm. Communication was great, very fast replies. The provided local coffee was great as well. Thank you!
It was also cool to learn a little bit about Cappie, and his involvement in the community. We found the Termesphere downtown, and gave the gears a spin. Then had to look it up and learn more about it.
Excellent location, beautiful cabin and the sauna is such a lovely bonus. Cappie is a wonderful host. We can’t wait to come back!

The place is an oasis. It’s a neat experience for folks who want to try something unique and a kind of coming home for people who love truly love the earth and sustainability. So many thoughtful details the home just FEEL better. The king size bed was luxurious and I slept like a baby. I love the moonlight pouring in through the window all night. Highly recommend. I might even move in ;)

This was a great place to stay while visiting the Black Hills! Location was close, without too much "touristy" things. Felt like we were in the country but we were in town, close to any conveniences we needed. Cappie made the transaction super easy! The cottage was roomy and comfortable.

Very clean and well kept. Good communication from hosts and provided everything you would need for your stay. Heated mattress pad on the bed was awesome. Only issue was that the internet was too slow for any streaming so we were unable to use the TV. Open concept leaves little privacy.

Can’t find better hospitality. Very unique house, we loved it. Wildlife all around. Had access to several areas that made our experience at Granny Flats even better. Definitely recommend. Thank you, Cappie!
We had a wonderful time. Would love to give more stars. Such a nice inviting place. Our host was great, definitely added to the fun of our vacation. Look forward to coming back.
This place is private and secluded. Beautiful view. Embodies all the great qualities about Spearfish.
Very clean, quiet, and unique! Enjoyed our stay 210%.
Great unique little house for a quiet getaway. Hosts are great and we had an amazing time.

We stayed for 5 nights, and loved every minute. The house is exactly as described, but our favorite part was the access to the creek (and swing)! The location is very convenient, and we were able to get to all the local must-see places easily. We hope to come back!

Would definitely recommend staying at Emily and Cappie’s getaway! The home is unique, the property is beautiful and we even had morning guests grazing in the yard! I loved every little detail and am grateful we chose to stay here!
Great location! The host and property was clean and in a excellent location!! Thank you Emily for being a great liaison as well!
Awesome place to stay! I would definitely recommend and stay there again. Host is great!
truly magnificent must see a one of a kind Motorcycle friendly

I had a great long weekend in the cabin, terrific location very friendly hosts!
Thank you!

A very unique experience, this is one of those places that I'm definitely going to tell everyone I know about. The cabin is perfectly isolated to give you privacy, and is extremely aesthetically pleasing. Overall I highly recommend it.

The only problem with our stay was that it wasn’t long enough. Cappie made our stay very comfortable and even took time out of his day to show us around the property and let our daughter gather eggs from the chickens. She really enjoyed the treehouse and taking a dip in the stream. We shall be back!! Thanks Cappie

Dont let the unique and sustainable features deter you, very comfortable place to stay. Private, quiet, and roomy. Super comfy bed and we left wanting to build a house like it one day! Also, it's a great location with plenty to do in and around Spearfish.

This home is a truly unique experience! Learning about off-grid living was so fun and eye opening. The home is clean, spacious, and well taken care of. The property has many places to sit and relax, whether in the tree house or the by the creek. Emily and Cappie are both awesome to work with! I cannot say enough positive things about this Airbnb. I highly recommend Granny Flats to anyone visiting the Black Hills area.
Beautiful and unique home in a great location! Deer grazing and the creek flowing on the property were nice additions to the experience.

Amazing place! We absolutely loved our stay here. Cappie is really nice and gave us a grand tour of the property. After we settled, we joined him for a refreshing (i.e., chilly!) dip in the water after a full day of hiking and driving. Loved everything about this place. It’s truly a gem in the Black Hills. We hope to return!
Great and beautiful! <3

Granny Flats is peaceful & beautiful! Cappie has built a wonderful piece of heaven here on earth. The Cottage is clean and comfortable- everything about our stay was perfect! This is the best place to stay when visiting the Black Hills. We loved it :-)

It was definitely an Off The Grid experience and perfect for our honeymoon. It was cozy, and plenty of room for us to sit outside and enjoy the quiet evenings.
I like the style of the home and the handmade tree decor in the living room. It was unique! Loved it!
Awesome place and great hosts. Super responsive and helpful.

Beautiful setting, very accommodating and friendly hosts! Flat was very clean, comfy bed, towels, etc. We enjoyed our stay, slept well and found it all charming and warm. Would definitely stay again! Great location, easy access.

We stayed in Emily’s place for a night after a long day of traveling. The house is exactly like the pictures. It was nice to walk around the property and their is a town walking trail nearby we also enjoyed. The house was easy to find, clean and the host was great. It was a fun experience we wouldn’t have had in a hotel.
Wonderful spot! Quiet area and wonderful tour given by Cappie of the area. Definitely a place to stay, not only once, that is for sure!
we loved this off the grid AirBnb. all th comforts of home, cozy and eco-friendly also. one of our most memorable stays thru airbnb
One of our favorite stays ever, and we've been to airbnb's around the globe. The off-grid house shows the amazing care with which it was built. It's also very comfortable. You will love it.
Great place to stay! Even though it is kinda in town, we felt like we were away from everything.

We greatly enjoyed our stay!
Very quiet location central to all of our planned adventures. Very clean and stocked with all essentials you would need. We loved the swimming hole, huge comfortable bed, electric reclining sofa, and the open walk in tile shower (I don’t think they have a picture, but it’s beautiful and big). The carport was also clutch because we experienced some of the local severe weather with hail and our rental car was protected!
I was a little worried about the compost toilet, but it did not smell at all and we were over our worry very quickly!

Came out here for a bday weekend and it came out to be extra special. The home is beautiful and unique with a feel of “traveling abroad” and views to compliment that feel. Cappie was an excellent host as well!

This was a welcoming and peaceful stay. The amount of care taken in building the house was impressive. The home is secluded yet nearby town so easy to get to places. Friendly and responsive owners. We'll be back!
This house is very unique. We enjoyed our story. It was peaceful and comfortable and clean.

Great place, accurately described and very comfortable. The bed and composting toilet are quite tall so if you are older, you may have a tough time. All in all a great stay, we stayed plenty warm during lower temps with the wood stove as it’s quite efficient. Definitely recommended!!
We had a great stay. Cappie’s place is clean and as described. Responses were very prompt. We really enjoyed the off the grid location.

Cappie is so inviting, such a people person, with vision!
This off the grid home was all I hoped to experience, and tucked away on a bit of unique heaven in Spearfish! 100/10
For anyone traveling, or one day hoping to live this life style, no better place to get your feet wet than at Cappies home! By no means is this roughing it! this strawbale home has all the amenities you will need, including the cuteness and cozy factors! And swapping adventures with this crew is a plus.
No disappointments!!!
Will stay again

What an awesome off-grid home! Cappie’s place is cozy, clean, unique, and set in a beautiful location with mountains right outside the windows. The hospitality was unmatched, and learning about the construction of the home was a bonus. Our stay was a much needed getaway (as a young couple looking to build off-grid in the near future). We couldn’t have had a better weekend exploring the Spearfish area and coming home to this little homestead. Highly recommended for anyone who’s not afraid of a wood stove or a composting toilet. Thanks again for everything!
Two thumbs way up! Very interesting place to stay. We loved it!
Fantastic bucolic farm! Perfect place to stay on our road trip. Lovely grounds and very kind hosts! Highly recommended.

You can tell a lot of love and hard work was put into this place. Very innovative as the house runs completely of the land and is build from natural resources. In a beautiful location secluded on their land. Make sure you take a walk to the creek and sit in the hammocks that are tied across it. Would definitely stay again!

Cappie’s place lives up to every expectation! The house has an artistic, funky vibe that we loved and was immaculate. Cappie met us at check in and gave us a great tour of the grounds which were amazing! We had a ton of fun listening to his entertaining stories about the various things he’s built. This wasn’t just an air bnb rental, it was an experience we’ll never forget! Do yourself a favor and stay for at least 2 days, not just one!

Our stay was wonderful! The house was fully equipped with all that was needed for our stay. The king size bed was a bonus! The hosts were very quick to respond with questions and actually met us for a walk through upon arrival. Great place! Perfect location! Please remember to go talk to the pigs. They get very excited to have company!
Mark and Tammy

This place is AMAZING! My fiancée and I were passing through on a cross country drive and stumbled upon Cappie’s place as an option not too far from Deadwood. It’s even better in person than any pictures can do justice. From the start with Cappie personally showing us the grounds and familiarizing us with the straw bale house - to the comfy king size bed and full kitchen, this experience was outstanding. I’ve stayed in many Airbnb’s over the years and have never been in such a thought provoking and well thought out, intentionally designed space. We will be back - and next time to stay for several days OFF THE GRID! 10/10 recommend - you’ll be a better person after taking a grain of what Cappie shares with you! He knows sustainability and it shows.

Cappie and Rachel’s house is truly wonderful — quiet, idyllic ... and *interesting*. We’re still talking about the creek, the treehouse, the sauna and the thoughtfulness of the house. All the gold stars from us.

Cappie and Rachel are a very accommodating couple, willing to work with your schedule and address your particular needs. They were quick to respond and address any concerns you had. Theirs is a very unique home, which mixed ecological conscientiousness with modern amenities. Some things, like the composting toilet and grey water requirements, seemed daunting before we arrived, but Rachel and Cappie leave detailed instructions and even supply anything out of the ordinary that you might need. Don't be afraid if this seems out of your comfort zone! It's a great experience.
We ended up staying an extra night at Cappie's place because of how much we loved it! I wrote a previous review for the first night.

Cappie & Rachel's place was the perfect stop for my partner and I are on our roadtrip. The house and amenities on the property were wonderful. We felt instantly welcome on the farm, enjoying the sauna and peaceful scenery. Cappie and Rachel were quick to answer questions and give us a tour when we arrived. I cannot recommend this stay enough! The house was cozy, full of light, and showed how much thought they put into the design. The bed was extremely comfortable, the kitchen had everything we needed, and the 2 shower heads were heavenly. We would definitely stay again! Thank you both :)
I would highly recommend staying here!!! It lived up to my expectations:-)

Cappie and Rachel were warm and welcoming. I appreciated the time they spent ensuring we were comfortable in their place, showing us the ins and outs of the amenities, and making suggestions for activities in Spearfish. Granny Flats is a thoughtfully designed and sustainably built place that is as relaxing as it is modernly functional. Thank you!
Cappie was wonderful and his place is beautiful! Was very accomidating to our needs!!

Cappie's place was truly unique and in an incredibly beautiful setting. The details of the house and structure are admirable--it was like a little oasis in Spearfish. We enjoyed hearing Cappie's story behind his work and the amazing property. We sat by the creek in the morning and had coffee, enjoying the peaceful setting, what a relaxing environment.
Wonderful place to escape to!

Staying at Cappie's place was a one-of-a-kind experience. We have been interested in strawbale for awhile, so we expected the clean, quiet functionality of the house. The pleasant surprise was the other projects on the property: the cob wood-fired sauna, the water wheel and plunge in the creek, chicken yard, swing, and hammocks. Fun for all! Rachel was very prompt, informative, and welcoming in her pre-visit communications, and Cappie spent a lot of time showing us around and enthusiastically answering our natural building questions. Thanks!

This off-the-grid Air BnB is just what Brian and I needed for a relaxing and scenic location. We enjoyed the total serenity of this location, the hammock hanging slightly over the stream was amazing, the swinging bench by the stream and the entire land layout is wonderful. I would recommend this Air BnB home to anyone who needs a peaceful, scenic spot.
This place was pretty amazing, being so close to everything while still having complete privacy was a rare location treat. We'll be back!

The property is centrally located yet seems secluded like it's in the middle of nowhere. Incredibly comfortable bed. Cappie is very personable and recommended the most AMAZING restaurants. We were even provided some fresh eggs, which were very much appreciated, we're just not really breakfast people. We'd definitely stay there again.
What an amazing place! Would recommend visiting! Very nice Host and truly a one of a kind experience!

We couldn't have been more pleasantly surprised with this cabin. The "live green" construction was beautiful and inspirational. Not to forget the privacy! Relax by the creek, take a dip if you're hot, nap in a hammock, sweat in the spa, jump on the trampoline or get in the car and take a short drive to everything from Devils Tower to Mt. Rushmore. With scenic hikes and breathtaking byways all around don't miss out on the perfect combination of beauty and relaxation with this place!

We had a fabulous time at Cappie's. The house was very clean and had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay. The shower was awesome and the bed was super comfortable. We especially enjoyed the swing and hammock at the creek. It was a great location for exploring the Black Hills and Devils Tower. Cappie was easy to communicate with and gave us information about the house and the nearby area when we checked in. This house is truly unique and a real gem! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Beautiful one bedroom home that is fully furnished. It's more than a house that's off the grid it's a work of art. We didn't run out of electricity (we had a lot of devices iPads iPhones etc). Hot water was perfect. When you meet Cappy to check in ask him where the locals eat for excellent restaurants. It's located in the city but you don't feel like your in the city. It's safe. It's close to a lot of major tourist attractions. Spearfish itself is really nice and is very eclectic. We were told to check out spearfish canyon and I am so glad we did. There are all these elements close by and then return to the home to freshen up. Look out the picture window late at night deer always came to visit.
Cappy and his wife are the nicest couple. Once you check in and get the tour they leave so you have privacy they are not helicopter hosts. Its also very clean and organized. I'm really glad I had this experience it's worth it.

What a cool house! Everything is super conservation- and eco-friendly, cappie and Rachel are incredibly friendly and made us feel welcome in their city and their home. It's apparent that cappie is proud of his work, and for a good reason!
A warning to those who care: there is no bathroom door.

This was an incredible off the grid experience. Admittedly we were coming into this expecting to compromise our needs, this was not the case at all. All the luxuries including hot water, sauna, and walk in shower with two shower heads. Bonuses included centrality to all the monuments and accommodating hosts. Our interest in sustainability and environmental consciencnous have grown considerably.

Staying in a beautiful custom home made my trip so much easier and ejoyable. The hosts accommodated me to the fullest and had the place ready quickly on short notice. Would definitely love to stay again soon!

Absolutely loved our stay at this cute Airbnb. Nice, new construction, nestled in the pine trees of the beautiful Black Hills. We enjoyed a cup of coffee on the patio in the morning and a cocktail by the fire in the evening. Comfortable beds and a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere made for the perfect getaway. Highly recommend!

The tiny cabin was packed with all you need, nice couch and recliner, good tv, washer and dryer, nice kitchen and comfy beds, timing didn't work out for us to get to their microbrewery and pizza business, and judging by the reviews, that was our loss!, maybe we have a reason to work spearfish into future plans. Enjoyed watching the turkeys come up from the draw in the evenings as well as the white tail and the late visiting mule deer. Thanks for hosting us, for the 2 days we were there we got the distinct impression this family doesnt let any grass grow under their feet!!
beautiful cabin with a beautiful view.
We love staying here, this was our third time and I am sure we will be back! Always a pleasure! 😁

We loved staying at the cabin. Perfect for a couple traveling with 2 dogs. Location was very private and peaceful. Can't beat the nightly beautiful sunsets. Our dogs enjoyed being able to run freely after long days of traveling in the car. The cabin was clean, cozy and had all the comforts of home. We would definitely stay here again while visiting the Black Hills.
Ali was quick to answer any questions we had and the cabin was quiet and perfect for our trip with our dogs. Lots of wildlife to enjoy and the area was beautiful.

Beautiful, private area. Needed a place to be able to let my dog walk around freely and this fit the bill. Other dogs in the area are very friendly. Had a good snow come in but they helped with clearing the snow off the porch and made sure the road was clear to get out. Was given a coupon for a free pizza at their nearby restaurant and tood advantage of that to have dinner with friends. Instructions sent by email and inside the house were clear and easy to understand. Comfortable loveseat in the living area and they provided DirectTV and a firestick so was able to relax with good entertainment in the evenings. Lots of electrical outlets made finding a place to keep electronics charged easy.
Quiet and peaceful stay.
Great place to stay when in Spearfish! Cozy and clean little home.
Peaceful comfortable and quiet, plenty of open space. Ali was a perfect host. Great location! Thanks Ali!
Very quiet and private- perfect place for a relaxing getaway with our dogs. Will definitely be back!
We loved the open space for our dog and ourselves
great place to stay!
Perfect cabin for our trip to Spearfish Canyon and Bear Butte State Park.
We really enjoyed the solitude. Was clean and comfortable.
It was a great place to stay! Nice and clean and quiet!
We were very satisfied
As described. Great location and excellent host!

Great place for a small group. we loved the place and how alone we felt. its about 600 sq ft but has everything you need. it's about 1.5 miles off the paved road but easy to get to in a vehicle The owner is very responsive and answered my call and provided good and accurate info.

This cozy charmingly crafted cabin in the Black Hills is surrounded by horses, cattle, deer, rabbits & turkeys. So quiet & peaceful, the lack of sound is deafening. Good heaters and chillers make for comfortable temperature control.

It was a great experience! It was peaceful, beautiful, and plenty of space for my kids and dogs to enjoy! She always responded quickly with questions and was super helpful. We even enjoyed pizza at their brewery that was delicious!
Amazing place and awesome host who went above and beyond expectations. I really enjoyed the coupon for pizza - may have even been the best pizza I ever had!
Cabin was clean, quiet, well-kept, and had everything we needed. Check-in was effortless and check-out undemanding. It's a fun location and a great deal for the area.
Great little home. Perfect for star watching at night. Close drive to lots of beautiful sites
Awesome little getaway cabin! Great sunsets from the front porch. Everything was clean and the place had everything we needed for a fun weekend. Make sure you check out their brewery in town!
The perfect place to stay if you want to get away from town and relax! We couldn’t have chosen a better place to stay that felt like home. Very clean and accommodating for our pup as well!
Perfection! We loved the privacy, room for our dog to roam, and proximity to town and hills. We will be back again.
Would stay again

This place was perfect for staying a couple nights and having good access to the Black Hills. It's a bit sparse, so wouldn't recommend planning to spend a bunch of time inside - but why would you when you have that amazing deck?
Great hosts, would stay again. Thank you!
This is our second time staying here and we absolutely love it! The cabin is adorable and spearfish is amazing! Cannot wait to come back!

The cabin Airbnb was absolutely amazing. It was very comfortable and relaxing. The views are spectacular and it was really cool to be visited by deer. Ali was very responsive to any questions we had. The Sawyer Brewery has amazing Pizza and there beers are really, really, really good. Did I mention there beers are really good. I would highly recommend staying in this Cabin if you find yourself in Spearfish SD.
This was the perfect place for our visit with our dog and for riding! We loved how peaceful it was and that it was perfect for us! Ali is very responsive anytime I messaged her!
Wonderful place! Excellent host and experience.
We enjoyed our stay here very much! We will be back!
Loved the cabin!! Ali is awesome!! Quiet, peaceful, lovely, comfortable!! Saw deer and a rabbit! Felt safe and secure!! Home has everything you could possibly want!!! A definite great choice!!

We enjoyed our stay very much. It was close to town, in a secluded spot, away from all the hustle and bustle. We enjoyed watching the deer and the horses graze out of the living room window. Just what we were looking for. Ali is a great host and we enjoyed a free pizza at her Brewery.

We stayed at Ali’s the first night and last night of our 12 day trip and it was so nice to end our stressful trip at Ali’s! It was a breath of fresh air after a 15 hour car trip and the area is so peaceful and beautiful!
Will definitely stay again when traveling through South Dakota.

Wonderful place to stay! My husband and I brought our two dogs, and they absolutely loved it! Very accommodating to bringing pets! And amazing restaurant/brewing co that they own! Beautiful surroundings and lots of nature to be enjoyed!

This was the second time we stayed here and it was wonderful stay with dogs and kids that need some space after two days in a car.. . Their brewery and pizzeria is top notch as well. Great food and beer!
Ali was very accommodating and we were able to park our moving truck at the cabin. The cabin was spacious, clean and quiet.
Great getaway cabin. We had such a nice trip with our two dogs. The shower is very small. But overall great place!
Nice relaxing place to stay. Quiet, very clean.

This is a very comfortable and complete cabin. It feels so remote but quite close to town. Loved the long-range views and clear starry nights.
Enjoyed watching a large flock of wild turkeys for our happy hour on the deck.

This lovely little cabin was the perfect getaway. We traveled by motorcycle from OH to explore the area and this was a great home base. Stocked well with all you'll need for multiple day stay, great view and local "neighbors" of dogs, cows, horses and turkeys are a bonus! Very affordable and worth it!!

A perfect little cabin away from the lights and the noise. The cabin was especially clean and had everything we needed. The location was fantastic being only 5 minutes or less from town but far enough away to enjoy the peaceful countryside.

Great place! Our dogs and kid had a great time running around the property. The cabin was clean and well kept. Such a great location for a get away in South dakota. we will be back! You will not be disappointed.

What a cute cabin! The location was so peaceful and quiet! Loved sitting outside in the morning and taking in all the sounds of nature…
A nice break from being in cities!
Great stay, quiet, beautiful view! Had everything we needed. Would certainly book again!
Great overnight stay for our family of four. Clean and had everything we needed. Also, the food was great at their restaurant Sawyer Brewing.
Nice little cabin with all amenities, nice area kind of tucked away, great communication, owns a brewery in town. I would bring my family here again.

This cabin was a perfect spot to stay with my dad for out Sturgis rally experience. Very clean and accommodating. the wildlife off of the front porch made our trip amazing! Also definitely go visit the Sawyer Brewery great pizza and killer brews!!!!

Lovely tiny cabin situated in a beautiful location in the countryside, but only ten minutes drive from Spearfish. I really enjoyed my stay here; the cabin was very clean, super comfortable, and had everything we needed; the scenery was just gorgeous and the lack of light pollution made for some great stargazing. Outstanding communications with the host, especially as we requested the booking a bit at the last minute - only a few hours before we were due to arrive. Ali was very quick to respond to our request and let us know right away that (luckily for us) there had been a cancellation and we could stay. I appreciated her speedy reply and that she was so welcoming and friendly. I would definitely recommend this property.
Great place for traveling through with kids and dogs! We loved it and would stay again for sure!
What a great cabin in a fantastic location! My kids loved running around and playing on the acreage. We would definitely stay again!

Ali was a great host and her cabin is wonderful. Great views of the rolling countryside which we enjoyed from the porch. The kitchen had most everything you would need to cook meals and everything worked well. You’re only a few minutes away from Spearfish but feel totally removed. We loved the beer and pizza from the Sawyer Brewing Company as well. We hope to be back!
This is a clean little cabin that is minutes from town, but still quiet and surrounded by country. Loved it!
Ali’s cabin is lovely! The complimentary pizza from their brewery was also wonderful. The kitchen was well stocked and the beds were comfy. I would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay! Super cute cabin!

Very nice private cabin. Plenty of room in a nice quiet setting. Perfectly located for your Black Hills adventure.
Make sure you stop by Sawyer’s Brewing Co for a drink and Pizza!!
LOVED this cabin. Bigger than we thought, very clean, our goldens loved the acreage. They also own a brewery/pizza place we checked out and it was SOO yummy.
Perfect place for a remote worker’s getaway- good shower, good internet, and quiet! Also enjoy the doggie that roams their property- he’s really cute and well mannered :)
We came to Spearfish for a friends wedding. Easy check in, easy to find, clean space. Convenient location to town. Very cute cabin.

We had a wonderful stay at Ali's cabin. My wife and I were passing through just for one night, and it was the perfect spot for us. We also brought our dog who had so much fun running around the yard. The place was clean, comfortable, and had all the amenities needed. Also - you must check out their brewery in Spearfish. Great beer, delicious pizza (and they give you a coupon for a free pizza - now that's service!)
Wonderful home! Had all the necessities and beautiful sunset views. Good proximity to some restaurants and we were offered a coupon to their own restaurant with fantastic pizza!
Nice place! Comfy bed!

Fantastic cabin to stay in! Had everything we needed and is a great location. We loved having our pets with us in a secluded area (but close to town). Sawyers pizza and beers were delicious and also in a gorgeous location.
Host is amazing with communication. Beautiful property in the mountains but still centrally located! Wonderful experience!

An amazing stay...we adored this place. Unfortunately, I messed up our reservation and had to cut it q day short...I was truly brokenhearted because this place just feels so peaceful. I hope to get back!!!
Wonderful country setting. Cabin had everything we needed. Very neat and clean.
This cute cabin is well maintained and clean. It's also so close to everything Spearfish. If we could have stayed forever we would have!
Beautiful and peaceful place

This cabin is nestled in a beautiful set of hills, it's not far from downtown. We had delicious ice cream and saw lots of restaurants.
I forgot some items and Ali was very helpful in returning them to me!

This little cabin is perfect and so homey and cute. My husband and I brought our two dogs and loved our stay. The cabin has everything you need and is in a great location! The pizza and beer were phenomenal. By far some of the best we have had!

We truly enjoyed our stay in Ali’s little cabin. It had about everything we needed (kitchen didn’t have mixing bowls or a 9x13 pan so bring those if cooking!) & was so cozy! It was very easy to find & very close to Spearfish if you wanted to run into town but far enough it gave you that country feel. Be sure to check out their other business Sawyer’s Brewing Co with the pizza coupon, great pizza! Thank you for allowing us to stay!
Great little cabin! Perfect for our stay!
Great little cabin off the beaten path but a short drive from Spearfish Canyon. Pet friendly. Clean and confortable. Would stay again!

Awesome little cabin. Would love to live in it. Beds were comfortable and whole place was super clean. The location is amazing. Cool scenery and quiet but not too far from town. Would definitely stay here again. Host was super easy to contact as well.

Peaceful and cozy. This is an amazing stop. We got in late so didn’t get to try the pizza! Hopefully if we find ourselves out this way again, we will get to! The place is so cute and clean. Ali was sweet and accommodating! Very thankful to have found this place!
Cute little cabin away from the hustle and bustle but still pretty close to town. We enjoyed it and so did our dogs. Great communication with a laid back atmosphere!
get away from town with this awesome cabin stay!

My husband & I (along with our dog) loved our stay. & we would 100% stay again. A cozy tiny cabin in a quiet rural area with great views w/ the added benefits of super great WiFi & I personally enjoyed the hot shower w/ great water pressure!
We also appreciated having the ‘out of town’ quiet & safety- while still having the town & Black Hills activities being a close drive.
Exactly as described, a great value - close to lots of things to do. We really enjoyed our stay!

Sweet place located close to town. Adorable and cozy, just right for the two of us. Quality linens/towels. Full kitchen thoughtfully stocked with essentials. Extra bonus was delicious pizza at their Sawyers Brewery (and good beer!) Even though their company building was on the same property, it still was extremely peaceful. Ali was great host.
A nice quiet getaway. A great place to stay, worth the trip!
We had a great visit at Ali’s place. She was very accommodating and the surrounding area was beautiful. Loved the log cabin! Thank you!

This little cabin is the perfect abode for a couple or small group! It's a short drive into Spearfish to enjoy all that it has to offer. We enjoyed our time in the "country" outside of town for a little r&r. The cabin had the perfect amount of space for our little group and the amenities were new and very well kept. It was quiet, peaceful and had some great views. I highly recommend Ali's place!

If you’re looking for a tranquil, cozy, country-like experience, this is absolutely the place! First of all, the little cabin is amazing and so much more spacious than it looks in the photos, and has all of the accommodations you would need - very well equipped. Welcome page is provided with great local recommendations - definitely try the pizza place/brewery that the homeowners recommend (and own, I think), it’s delicious! I think my favorite part was waking up to the sound of a rooster crowing and also the pretty black horse in the field that always walked to the fence when you come out. Will definitely be recommending to friends :)
Absolutely wonderful little cabin surrounded by stunning views of horses, cattle and landscape. My hunny and I didn't want to leave.

Ali was an awesome host for our stay in Spearfish. This felt like a nice country getaway with the added convenience of being close to town. The cabin was clean and spacious with a full kitchen and the modern washer/dryer was a huge plus. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a place to stay in Spearfish!

We had an excellent stay. this was a great stay. would definitely stay here again. very comfortable stay

Very clean. Spearfish is awesome.

Amazing apartment in a great location in spearfish!

everything about this place is great and worth it!
it's a great deal! I would love to come back!

Stunning place, perfect location and outstanding communication with the host! Will definitely stay again next time!!!
Comfortable accommodation. Nicely appointed kitchen for a short-term rental. Very nice appliances. The bed was comfortable and we both slept great.

Great location! Very clean and cute place to stay!!
I loved this Airbnb. It was cozy, super clean and newly remodeled. I will book again. I highly recommend 👌🏻

Very clean place!

stranded in spearfish and Chad was so good at getting us In asap! so cute and cozy. will stay again ❤
Loved this Airbnb. Will stay again.

Nice, new and clean. Comfortable bed too so we were happy campers.

Nice place to stay! They were great at communicating. Nice and quiet but not too far out of town. I was under the impression that the whole house was ours, but it was the lower level. Which could have been my mistake.
Our first Air BnB experience and it will be very hard to top! What an amazing place in a phenomenal location. Sparkling clean and very friendly helpful host.
A wonderfully cozy space and such kind hosts!
Beautiful space. So many turtles. Breakfast sandwiches!
A wonderfully cozy little place back in the trees. Lang was unbelievable
This an awesome place to stay nestled in the foothills of the black hills an a couple minutes from spearfish,the hospitality is great!
We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend at the Turtle House! A darling little space, just the right size for us, and we loved the kitchen and the peaceful atmosphere!

Loved it so much we decided to stay longer. The place had everything you need for cooking and cleaning as well as a good varietyof breakfast food and guides for the area. Perfectly located to get around.

Beautiful get away. Only a few minutes drive from stores and restaurants but having a secluded feel. The place is cozy and the only view you see is trees and a green house giving you the country mountain feel while being close to conveniences. The place is fully equipped for cooking. We stayed during a snowstorm and had everything we needed to be shut in for a few days. The driveway and road are gravel and dirt but easily traversed by a regular car. We enjoyed it so much we extended our stay by 4 days. Lang was very good to us checking on us regularly to see if we needed anything. Good breakfast items were provided for us and everything was very clean. Cleaning supplies and essentials (toiletpaper, shampoo, trash liners) were readily available.

Lang’s place was a quaint hideaway conveniently located in the black hills and many attractions. Very homey and Lang was very attentive to any concerns and quick to respond. Very friendly! I recommend this nice place to everyone. Beautiful natural scenery surrounds the area.

When looking for a space to stay in the Black Hills you can't beat the Turtle House! The level of detail and care that was put into the stay betrays the fact that an artist was involved. The best example of this is that they have a pasta pot with its own strainer! Will definitely return when back in the region!

Nature is all around! The entrance has a sharp corner that greats you with art blended with nature through the property. Straight in front of you is The Turtle House. Touches of art and turtles are displayed around this warm and cozy little place, giving you the feel that you are in a cabin.
What a great place to stay!
The location is perfect. The space is nicely set up with unique design features. I would have liked a few more cooking tools in the kitchen like pans to cook with in the oven and some large bowls.
Better than we could have expected! So nice to come "home" to after a long day of traveling.

This place is seriously awesome. You have everything you need: towels, kitchen supplies, coffee, extra blankets. We appreciated the cozy space that was well thought out and similar to a tiny home. Lang was an incredible host and always replied quickly and reached out to see if things were going well. We also appreciated seeing the incredible pieces at the Termesphere gallery right next door. Next time we're in the area, this is our spot!
Great place to stay! Will definitely book here again! Great location! Very clean and host responds quick and very helpful!

You want to stay here! The space and hosts are perfect. Hosts are artists and have a gallery where you can purchase art and prints. The cabin is nestled in the trees. If I'm in Spearfish again, I won't stay anywhere else.
What a cool theme! The Turtle house definitely impressed. Great location and great hosts. Could have not asked for a better stay.
Beautiful space, perfect for a family of 4/5, or a couple’s get away! Close to town and feels like you’re in the canyon!
Great location and a unique space to call home while enjoying the area. Thoughtfully appointed with nice touches everywhere you look.

Lang's place is beyond was we expected. Very cozy with all the amenities you can think of, including a lovely assortment of snacks, teas, and breakfast items. You will not be disappointed in your stay here!
What a dreamy place!! You’d wake up enjoying the view of nature. It was warm, it had tons of thoughtful add one, and good privacy. I’d totally come back!!!
Really fun place, in a cool location!

The Turtle House is a convenient place to explore the area from. It was cozy, with nice “stocked” items for us to use as needed. The fireplace is the perfect place to end the day in front of. Looking forward to returning on my trips to that area!
Lang is a great host and the turtle house is a unique and cosy place to stay. It's very clean and the fire was already going for us when we arrived on a cold wintery night!
Turtle house was a above expectations! Very charming Hope to come back and stay longer! Don’t miss a stop at the Termes gallery connected to the Airbnb!

Super clean, love the artistic touches and the outside of the house (really looks like a turtle), warm and cozy on a snowy night, nice options for breakfast (tools to cook if needed- pans/oil/stove). It was bright and breezy in the sun, great aesthetic appeal for this lil-hipster girl. Definitely choose this if you are staying in Spearfish!
Very fun and interesting space in a beautiful location!

5 Stars are not enough stars for Lang's awesome place. I've stayed in well over 50 AirBnBs and this was one of the best. Really beautifully designed and crafted interior. Every amenity you can think of, and all artfully done. And the incredible exterior -- a fabulous wild game (including deer, eagles, coyotes and turkeys) area is right outside the door. A beautiful ridge (great hiking space) runs just behind the property and the Black Hills National Forest is a short ride up the road. Plus this perfect space (for up to 4 guests, including the bunk beds) is integrated into the geodesic-dome compound of the host's internationally- renowned artistic family. That's the excellent frosting on this really excellent cake. I can't recommend it highly enough! If you're visiting the Black Hills, stay here! You won't be sorry.
Beautiful, spacious house in a nice neighborhood, easy access to BHSU and the town of Spearfish. We would definitely stay again!

This is a pricy place for a short stay of one person. But, it’s in a very safe and rich neighborhood of Spearfish, according to my friend who lives there and whom I was visiting.
